title: Asian Development Bank funded Second Integrated Road Investment Programme - awarding of ten civil work contract packages in the Western Province
decision_details: The proposal made by the Minister of Roads and Highways, to award 10 civil work contract packages for the rehabilitation, improvement and maintenance of rural roads in the Western Province implemented under the Second Integrated Road Investment Programme to the institutions namely, M/s NCC Limited, Kalika Construction Pvt. Ltd., and Gamini Construction Joint Venture, Hovel Construction Pvt. Ltd., and Senok Trade Combine (Pvt.) Ltd., Joint Venture, Access Engineering PLC and Luxman Metal Crushers & Enterprises, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
